name: Reef
description: Reef is a blockchain that is fast, affordable, and aiming to be the easiest to access and use. Through its core apps like Reef Chain Wallet, ReefScan, ReefSwap, and Reef Bridge, Reef is opening up access to blockchain technology to both new and experienced users. Bridge your legacy $REEF tokens on Ethereum and BNB Chain to Reef Chain before the Q1 2026 deadline: https://reefbridge.app Reef brings a simple, easy to understand experience to people around the world through beautiful user interfaces, analogizing Web3 terms to their existing Web 2.0 equivalents (e.g. Reef Name Service = username), while leaving you in full control of your wallet and tokens. Thanks to low fees (5 REEF on average), widespread coin access through several centralized exchanges that don't require identity verification, and a familiar user onboarding experience, Reef will be the easiest blockchain to get access to and start using. **Reef is built for you, ready for everything.**
